name: Escape House 2
description:
Escape House 2 is a text adventure game where you have to escape a house. It's a pretty small game, and it was made during a course that I am following.

Please keep in mind that this is not a continuation, but a completely new version of the game. I want to keep the old version online as well, but for personal reasons I can't have both on the same download page. We hope you understand that! 

It works with the "Press S to Search the room" and stuff.

Voiced by the amazing lovely Leah, or xSpyInPinkx.  https://www.twitch.tv/xspyinpinkx || https://twitter.com/xSpyInPinkx
